DOC.brief_summary: This observational study is conducted in Europe. The trial aims to observe the incidence of serious adverse drug reactions in children and adolescents with type 1 diabetes during Levemir® treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Observe the Safety of Levemir® Treatment in Children and Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Informed consent obtained prior to any trialrelated activities Any patient with diabetes type 1 is eligible for the study, including newly The selection of the patients will be at the discretion of the individual physician Type 2 diabetes Currently treated with Levemir®
